titleStmt.title: Israel and England paralelled, in a sermon preached before the honorable society of Grayes-Inne, upon Sunday in the afternoon, Aprill 16. 1648. / By Paul Knell, Master in Arts of Clare-Hall in Cambridge. Sometimes chaplaine to a regiment of curiasiers in his Majesties Army.
titleStmt.author: Knell, Paul, 1615?-1664.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
